mapper.select: select campname, campaddr, room, campimg, payidx from camp where campname = #{campname}
select campname, campaddr, room, campimg, payidx, content, nvl(chk, 'y') from camp c , viewcamp v where c.CAMPIDX=v.CAMPIDX(+) and nvl(chk, 'y') != 'n' order by c.campidx

select * from camp
where campaddr like '%${searchName}%'
where room like '%${searchName}%'

select t.* from (select r.CHECKIN,r.CHECKOUT, r.USERNAME,r.CAMPNAME,r.ROOM,c.CAMPADDR,c.PAYIDX,c.CAMPIDX from reserve r, camp c where r.campname = c.campname ORDER BY r.CHECKIN desc) t
where to_char(checkin,'mm') like '%${searchName}%'
where username like '%${searchName}%'
order by checkin desc

select to_char(checkin, 'dd') co1, sum(PERSON+KID) co2 from reserve
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '01'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '02'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '03'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '04'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '05'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '06'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '07'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '08'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '09'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '10'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '11'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '12'
GROUP BY to_char(checkin, 'dd')

select to_char(checkin, 'dd') co1, sum(payidx) co2 from reserve
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '01'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '02'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '03'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '04'

where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '07'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '08'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '09'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '10'
where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = '11'

select room from camp where campname=#{campname}
select c.*, chk from camp c, viewcamp v where c.campidx = v.campidx(+)
select r.CHECKIN,r.CHECKOUT, r.USERNAME,r.CAMPNAME,r.ROOM,c.CAMPADDR,c.PAYIDX,c.CAMPIDX, c.ROOMCNT,c.ROOMNO from reserve r, camp c where r.campname = c.campname ORDER BY r.CHECKIN desc

select (select count(*) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'mm') =to_char(sysdate,'mm')) tmonth, (select count(*) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'mm') =to_char(sysdate,'mm')-1) lmonth, (select count(*) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'yymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd')) tpeople, (select count(*) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'yymmdd') = to_char(sysdate+1, 'yymmdd')) ypeople, (select sum(payidx) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm')) sumpay, (select nvl(sum(payidx), 0) from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'yymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd')) daypay from dual
select to_char(checkin, 'dd') co1, sum(PERSON+KID) co2 from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'mm')=to_char(sysdate, 'mm') GROUP BY to_char(checkin, 'dd')
select to_char(checkin, 'dd') co1, sum(payidx) co2 from reserve where to_char(checkin, 'mm')=to_char(sysdate, 'mm') GROUP BY to_char(checkin, 'dd')
